messages.message:
> feel free to announce the new UAT cut-off broadly
we should announce this in <#C06FA6A23|> and an email to <mailto:dept-engineering@instabase.com|dept-engineering@instabase.com> since slack messages could be lost
just to confirm, we need to announce that all UAT should be finished by the Wednesday during the second week of UAT, right? @Cody Boggs
Should be completed before the second Wednesday of UAT, yes, as certification will happen on that Wednesday morning
@Ashish can you help send out the comms for this?
will send out -- can someone confirm that we'll start this process with 25.14 which is next week? :slightly_smiling_face:
Yup, once it's announced I'll update the code cut docs and tweak the schedules. :slightly_smiling_face:
Yes. We can start it next week onwards
